title.a: Update Fatality Traffic Collision with Entrapment FINAL - 07/06/2022 INC#0475

item.description: Update FINAL - Fatality Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0475; 09:58AM; 20100 W Parthenia St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bNTLOl; #Winnetka; 2 vehicles. 3 patients total = 17 year-old male driver of overturned vehicle, deceased at scene. An approximately 20 year-old male passenger in that vehicle, was taken to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in critical condition with unspecified injuries. The third patient, from the other vehicle, was an approximately 40 year-old female found curbside with minor injuries. She has declined ambulance transportation. #LATraffic: The intersection of Parthenia Street and Winnetka Avenue is closed to all traffic until the LAPD investigation is complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Transit Users: Follow @MetroLAAlerts https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts on Twitter for any service related information. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #1430) and Coroner.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 E107 E273 E296 EM15 HR3 RA104 RA107 RA872 RA96 T73 T96 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Fatality Traffic Collision with Entrapment 07/06/2022 INC#0475

item.description: Fatality Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#0475; 09:40AM; 20100 W Parthenia St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3bNTLOl; #Winnetka; Two vehicle collision with a total of 3 patients, including two trapped in an overturned vehicle on LAFD arrival. One of the trapped persons proved beyond medical help, was determined dead and remains at the scene. The other trapped person was freed by firefighters and has been taken to an area hospital in undetermined condition. The third patient, found curbside with minor injuries, is declining ambulance transportation. No information currently available on age / gender / condition / affiliation / circumstances. #LATraffic: Closure of one or more lanes at or near the intersection of Parthenia Street and Winnetake Avenue until the LAPD investigation is complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Transit Users: Follow @MetroLAAlerts https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts on Twitter for any service related information. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #1430) and Coroner. ; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E103 E104 E107 E273 E296 EM15 HR3 RA104 RA107 RA872 RA96 T73 T96 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0249; 06:06AM; 1365 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3IgKbjf; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: 50 firefighters extinguished the fire in 38 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to the building of origin. This vacant structure has burned previously. No further details.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 CM22 E10 E17 E2 E202 E210 E25 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 RA17 RA25 T10 T2 T9 ; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1780; 09:46PM; 1646 W 51st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AsriIc; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews contained the fire to the garage involved and prevented it from extending into the exposed structure. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E21 E221 E266 E34 SQ21 T21 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Hazardous Materials - Fuel Leak; INC#1158; 02:45PM; Wb 210 Fy x Wheatland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3urBHQC; Shadow Hills; A traffic collision between a semi (now jack-knifed) vs auto resulted in approximately 100G fuel leak spilling across the freeway. The WB210 just east of Wheatland offramp has ALL lanes of traffic closed. This will be an extended duration operation (time unknown) and all drivers are advised to take alternate routes and check https://cad.chp.ca.gov/Traffic.aspx for the latest updates. No injuries reported. CHP Log# 1569. No further details; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC14 E17 E21 E221 E24 E287 E87 EM14 RA874 RA91 SQ21 SQ87 T21 T87; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0962; 01:06PM; 4867 W Melrose Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gjsRxu; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to a storage shed behind the dwelling. The fire extended a detached garage and auto. Cause and $ loss TBD.
